<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">618ae55b2b4a5210eec1fdb36e91bf14</macroponent><name>stylized_text_73/now_default/text</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
// Ensure this script is attached to the appropriate client state or event
function roundUpDecimalNumber() {
    // Get the client state value
    let decimalNumber = @state.selected_cost; // Replace 'myDecimalNumber' with your actual client state key
    
    // Perform rounding up using Math.ceil
    let roundedNumber = Math.ceil(decimalNumber);

    // Update the client state with the rounded value
    state.selected_cost = roundedNumber;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-12-02 20:03:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>2e530a682b9ada10a7a0ff61de91bff6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_73/now_default/text</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rent Assist" source="x_snc_rent_assist">8c0fd1db2bc65210eec1fdb36e91bfc0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Rent Assist">8c0fd1db2bc65210eec1fdb36e91bfc0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_2e530a682b9ada10a7a0ff61de91bff6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-12-02 20:03:54</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
